short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A marker that allows users to draw on webpages and annote anything they feel like

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hey! My name's Ali. This chrome extension is a project of mine that allows users to draw on any webpage. They can use it to annotate things such as questions or just doodle on anything. I will be updating this often. Check it out!
